title: What Happens to the Mean and Standard Deviation?
question_text:

If the minimum value was changed from twenty to twelve, what would happen to the mean and standard deviation of the data set?

choices.text: Both the mean and standard deviation would decrease.
The mean would decrease and the standard deviation would increase.
Both the mean and standard deviation would remain the same.
The mean would increase and the standard deviation would decrease.
Both the mean and standard deviation would increase.
